Class SynthVoice

java.lang.Object
com.jsyn.unitgen.UnitGenerator
SynthVoice
public class SynthVoice extends com.jsyn.unitgen.UnitGenerator
SynthVoice class for generating a single voice of the synthesizer extends UnitGenerator

    • refreshSignalChain

      public void refreshSignalChain()
      Fully disconnects and reconnects the signal chain for this voice. mimicking the setCurrentOscType method but without creating a new oscillator
